grails.plugins.mongodb

Class MongoHolderBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • grails.plugins.mongodb.MongoHolderBean

  • public class MongoHolderBean
extends Object
    should be registered with spring. provides access to all relevant instances for working with mongodb

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MongoHolderBean(org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsApplication application)
      Parses config options, creates database connection and morphia & datastore instances
